Orem.Pleasant Grove Town Hall:
The Pleasant Grove Town Hall at 107 S. 100 East in Pleasant Grove, Utah was built in 1887. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1985.
In 1985 it was the second oldest and the best preserved public building in Pleasant Grove, and is one of about a dozen well-preserved buildings constructed of locally quarried soft, tufa rock in the town.
